title: [Large-Scale] Engagement Analysis and Utilization Strategies in Digital Reading Assessments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Statistical Analysis and Experience with Digital Assessment Tools
context.additional_context: Microlearning module operations utilizing mobile devices in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze large-scale digital reading assessment data to identify engagement profiles (affective, behavioral, and cognitive dimensions).
Learners can interpret the impact of engagement profiles on academic achievement and self-efficacy.
Learners can propose personalized digital reading assessment design strategies based on analytical results.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
